A constant that represents a sailor event.

Sells all remaining cargo in the ship and updates the wealth of the player.

setStore(Store) - Method in class MainGameLogic.Island
Sets the Store of the MainGameLogic.Island this is done after the initializes as Store have there own initializes setup.
SetUp - Class in MainGameLogic
This class implements a "static" class SetUp which hold the initialized information for the MainGameLogic.GameEnvironment and can we accessed but not initialized itself.
SetUpScreen - Class in GUI
This class builds the SetUpScreen window which gives the player a GUI where they can decide on certain options for their game such as: choosing their displayed name in game, choosing how many days they want the game to last for (game length) and choosing the ship they would like to play the game with(this affects certain statistics for the player).
SetUpScreen(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class GUI.SetUpScreen
Initializes the setup screen class.
Ship - Class in MainGameLogic
This class implements a Ship which is used for traveling between Islands and stores the current goods and upgrades the player has brought.
Ship(String, int, double, double, ArrayList<Upgrade>) - Constructor for class MainGameLogic.Ship
Initializes a Ship object.
ShipActionListener - Class in GUI
Implements a Listener that checks to see if a JButton has been pushed.
ShipActionListener(int, SetUpScreen) - Constructor for class GUI.ShipActionListener
Initializes an ShipActionListener.
soldAtStore(int) - Method in class MainGameLogic.GameLogic
Gets the information related to all the items currently being sold at the Store.
SpinnerListener - Class in GUI
Implements a Listener that checks to see if a JSpinners have had its values changed.
SpinnerListener(JButton, GameLogic, String, JLabel) - Constructor for class GUI.SpinnerListener

StartUpScreen - Class in GUI
Code for window that displays when launching the application.
StartUpScreen(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class GUI.StartUpScreen
Initializes the start screen class.
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class GUI.SpinnerListener
Overrides the state changed method that activates when the state of the spinner has changed.
stealCargo() - Method in class MainGameLogic.Ship
During the pirate event if lost this method is used to "steal" all the players cargo without giving them any increases in their wealth.
Store - Class in MainGameLogic
This class represents the Stores in game and holds the items each have along with the code needed to buy and sell items to the Store.
Store(List<String>, ArrayList<Item>, String) - Constructor for class MainGameLogic.Store
Initializes the Store object which is used when the player wishes to buy or sell items during their visit to the Store on the current MainGameLogic.Island.
StoreTableModel - Class in GUI
Defines the table model for the displaying the Items from the Store during the game.
StoreTableModel(ArrayList<Item>, GameLogic) - Constructor for class GUI.StoreTableModel
Initializes an A TableModel for a table.
StoreTableSelectionModel - Class in GUI
Defines the selection model for selecting Items from the Store during the game.
StoreTableSelectionModel(JTable, StoreTableModel, JFrame, GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class GUI.StoreTableSelectionModel
Initializes an A selectionModel for a table.
